textContent:
1. Define what's the power cieling of the universe is. In my case, the Scholar is pretty much a God. She can use unlimited mana to bend reality at all times.
2. All factions should react to important events. Think of Game of Thrones and how interconnected the world felt. If there's a Big Bad, the factions will react according to their best interest. If a war breaks out between factions/guilds, the rest react. Use the prisoner's dilema to flesh out those reactions.
3. Keep the power level of the players believable.
